item.description:
Update: I am sorry for the short notice, but it appears as though I will not be able to make the walden swim this Saturday I had scheduled! I would encourage you that have RSVPd or were considering it to still get together and swim! I was in there on monday and it was fabulous!

Next weekend I will be at the Chicago Tri so no walden swim for me, but if someone would like to step up as assistant organizer you can arrange a time!
item.name: Walden Swim
